name: Resident Evil 5: Desperate Escape
description:
Resident Evil 5: Desperate Escape is an action game. It was originally released in 2010. On review aggregator Metacritic, Resident Evil 5: Desperate Escape has a score of 74. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Resident Evil 5: Desperate Escape on PlayStation 3.
